results.name: MomDaily ( React.js )
results.description:
此為參考 PopDaily 所做的練習網站，分別有首頁、聯絡我、登入等頁面
*串接 The New York Times 的 API 以取得文章內容
*使用 Material UI 以及 React Bootstrap 提供的 components (Carousel/Dropdowns...等)
*使用 Fontello / Material Design 的 icons
*Responsive Web Design

results.name: E Shopping Mall ( React.js )
results.description:
此為簡易電子商務網站練習，將商品加入購物車之後，可點擊購物車選擇商品數量並查看金額
*串接自己透過 My JSON Server 於 github 建立的 json API，以取得商品內容
使用　React Bootstrap 提供的 components
*使用 Bootstrap 的 icons
*Responsive Web Design

results.name: To Do List ( React.js )
results.description:
利用 react.js 做成的 To-do List
包含 create / read / update / delete 四種基本功能

results.name: Member List ( React.js / API)
results.description:
This member list is created by using React.
Get data from API provided by https://randomuser.me/
Use components from react-bootstrap

results.name: My Personal Homepage
results.description:
This is my personal website.
* Responsive Web Design
* Get data from another HTML page and insert it into the displayed page by AJAX.
* Insert the data from JSON into the displayed page by AJAX.
* Make an intro animation by Javascript.
Thank you for viewing my website !

results.name: HTML/CSS/RWD Practice
results.description: This practice is based on the website of Asus (Taiwan-based multinational computer and phone hardware and electronics company). Improve my HTML, CSS, and JavaScript skills. Much more details of the process and the problems I dealt with are in my blog.

results.name: Multiple Users
results.description: Get data from an API , and display it in HTML. To make the data much easier to read, I used CSS and JS to hide part of information until the user open it.
